title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: APT Drops 5.6% as Index Trades Lower From Monday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Solana (SOL) joined Aptos (APT) as an underperformer, falling 5.1%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3183.11, down 1.4% (-46.75) since 4 p.m ET on Monday.

Two of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+4.9%) and BTC (+0.3%).

Laggards: APT (-5.6%) and SOL (-5.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading down 1.4% with only 2 of 20 assets higher and significant declines in APT (-5.6%) and SOL (-5.1%), indicating overall market weakness.
